Posts.Content: logcabingirl2 wrote: I was diagnosed in May and am still waiting for surgery. This is getting so frustrating for me. I have it in my left breast and calcification in my r breast. I want them both removed and want reconstruction using the fat from my stomach. Has anyone had this type of surgery and how long were you down? I just want to get this over with and get on with my life. Log in to post a reply
